}

	e_lg = {
		color={ 201 19 93 }
		color2={ 200 0 0 }
		
		title = "CORPORATE_EMPEROR"
		title_female = "CORPORATE_EMPRESS"
		title_prefix = "CORPORATE_EMPIRE_OF"
		dynasty_title_names = no 	# Will not be named "Seljuk", etc.
		
		capital = 2882 #Namwon

		allow = {
			conditional_tooltip = {
				trigger = {
					e_lg = {
						is_titular = yes
					}
				}
				e_lg = {
					is_titular = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
	e_hyundai = {
		color={ 10 34 104 }
		color2={ 200 0 0 }
		
		title = "CORPORATE_EMPEROR"
		title_female = "CORPORATE_EMPRESS"
		title_prefix = "CORPORATE_EMPIRE_OF"

		allow = {

				trigger = {
					e_hyundai = {
						is_titular = yes
					}
				}
				e_hyundai = {
					is_titular = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
